Keywords: Cosmic , Herald , Warrior
Real Name: Norrin Radd
Special Powers
POWER COSMIC RETURNS...: Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks.
I WILL FREE ALL OF YOU!: STOP. Invincible. // When this click is first revealed, Silver Savage can't be healed above this click this game and after resolutions remove an action token from all friendly characters and equip Silver Savage with a FFFF #s004 Silver Surfboard from outside the game.

Comments
December 14, 2021
jcintro
When I first saw the dial for this figure, I was amazed by the potential that Silver Savage has. A very potent close combat bruiser starting off, when he gets hit to his stop click, he can change the tide of the game by freeing up your characters and becoming a very mobile shooter and scooter. A very well designed figure who performs above and beyond his point cost!
February 25, 2021
Decoder
Only piece I wanted from this WHOLE SET! I still have the original silver savage and I use to bust him out and played with my friends using the BOTS.. BUT NOW! I can play him without a resource! Only version of silver surfer I like! About time he got a new sculpt
February 19, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
So I finally played him in a game and he may honestly be one of the best 100 point beatsticks in the entire set/game. Between his ridiculously stable defense powers (nothing but impervious/invincible), a stop click, TONS of flurry, 12 attack value, and 4 damage that he will inevitably land on, and being entirely unoutwittable give him such a huge advantage.
February 12, 2021
DatHomieSilverSurfer
In the 8 years between galactic guardians at the F4 set, someone at wizkids must have finally read a story with Surfer in it because the difference in quality of dials is astounding. Every surfer dial in the past had middling stats and damage, was expensive and saddled with bad power combos, and had garbage attack values for a character his cost. He would hit as hard as batman and be less accurate than robin. ...but now....now Norrin can finally keep up with Marvels other big dog characters in his weight class like Thor and Hulk. Hell, I think this dial could potentially even take on 200 pt worldbreaker
February 11, 2021
Goop
He looks very fun to play. You are a massive hard hitting brusier at the start with charge, quake and battle fury with great def and dmg. Then you STOP call the Surfboard and go nuts hypersonicing around abusing your 8 range and 2 bolt targets. Steal energy on every attack but not past your stop click. Looks like a very fun and strong piece.
